ygData.subject: H3 and Maven
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi folks, I m trying to use H3 as a dependency. I was able to run it inside Eclipse by checking out the sources and building the eclipse project with mvn

Hi folks,

I'm trying to use H3 as a dependency. I was able to run it insid=
e Eclipse by checking out the sources and building the eclipse project with=
 mvn eclipse:eclipse. That went surprisingly well. Now I setup my own proje=
ct and I want to implement some custom Preselectors. I tried to add H3 as a=
 dependency with:

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.archive.heritrix</groupId>
 =
 <artifactId>heritrix</artifactId>
  <version>3.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
</de=
pendency>

which worked but I get a build path error saying that  M2_REPO/o=
rg/archive/heritrix/heritrix/3.0.1-SNAPSHOT/heritrix-3.0.1-20110413.010024-=
82.jar is missing. 

So my question is: Is there a way to include H3 as a d=
ependency.

I add this repository to my repositories tag:
<repository>
  <r=
eleases>
    <enabled>true</enabled>
    <updatePolicy>daily</updatePolicy>=

    <checksumPolicy>warn</checksumPolicy>
  </releases>
  <snapshots>
    =
<enabled>true</enabled>
    <updatePolicy>never</updatePolicy>
    <checksu=
mPolicy>fail</checksumPolicy>
  </snapshots>
  <id>internetarchive</id>
  <=
name>Internet Archive Maven Repository</name>
  <url>http://builds.archive.=
org:8080/maven2</url>
  <layout>default</layout>
</repository>

Also I get =
this error in the cli: 
repository metadata for: 'snapshot org.archive:heri=
trix:3.0.1-SNAPSHOT' could not be retrieved from repository: agilejava due =
to an error: Error transferring file: Server returned HTTP response code: 4=
00 for URL: http://blog.flotsam.nl//maven/org/archive/heritrix/3.0.1-SNAPSH=
OT/maven-metadata.xml

Thanks in advance for any hints!

Cheers,
norman
